AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), WORKING_DAY) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDate})
AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), WORKING_DAY) = TO_DATE(#{startDate})
AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), WORKING_DAY) = TO_DATE(#{endDate})
AND NVL(STATUS, '결근') IN
#{item}
ORDER BY WORKING_DAY )

SELECT NVL(EMP_NO, #{empNo}) "emp_no" , NVL(ATT_DATE, TO_CHAR(WORKING_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) "att_date" , NVL(START_TIME, '-') as "start_time" , NVL(END_TIME, '-') as "end_time" , NVL(STATUS, '결근') "status" FROM ATTENDANCE RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(SYSDATE), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1 "WORKING_DAY" , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'DY') "WEEK" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SYSDATE)), 'DD') ) ON (ATT_DATE = WORKING_DAY) WHERE WORKING_DAY < TO_DATE(SYSDATE) AND NVL(EMP_NO, #{empNo}) = #{empNo} AND WEEK IN ('월', '화', '수', '목', '금')
AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), WORKING_DAY) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDate})
AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), WORKING_DAY) = TO_DATE(#{startDate})
AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), WORKING_DAY) = TO_DATE(#{endDate})
AND NVL(STATUS, '결근') IN

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT NVL(ATT_DATE, TO_CHAR(WORKING_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) "ATT_DATE" , C.DEPT_NAME , C.EMP_NAME , NVL(START_TIME, '-') "START_TIME" , NVL(END_TIME, '-') "END_TIME" , NVL(TOTAL_TIME, 0) "TOTAL_TIME" , NVL(A.STATUS, '결근') "STATUS" FROM ATTENDANCE A RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT WORKING_DAY, WEEK, EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(SYSDATE), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1 "WORKING_DAY" , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'DY') "WEEK" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SYSDATE)), 'DD') ), ( SELECT E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME , CASE WHEN D.DEPT_NAME != E.DEPT_NAME THEN D.DEPT_NAME || ' ' || E.DEPT_NAME ELSE D.DEPT_NAME END "DEPT_NAME" FROM ( SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , CASE WHEN D1.UPPER_NO = 0 THEN D1.DEPT_NO ELSE D1.UPPER_NO END AS DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D1 ON (D1.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO) ) E LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) ) ) C ON (ATT_DATE = WORKING_DAY AND A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO) WHERE WORKING_DAY < TO_DATE(SYSDATE) AND WEEK IN ('월', '화', '수', '목', '금') AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), TO_DATE(WORKING_DAY)) BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-09-01') AND TO_DATE('2022-09-15') AND NVL(A.STATUS, '결근') IN ('정상', '지각', '결근', '휴가') ORDER BY WORKING_DAY DESC )

SELECT NVL(ATT_DATE, TO_CHAR(WORKING_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) "ATT_DATE" , C.DEPT_NAME , C.EMP_NO , C.EMP_NAME , NVL(START_TIME, '-') "START_TIME" , NVL(END_TIME, '-') "END_TIME" , NVL(TOTAL_TIME, 0) "TOTAL_TIME" , NVL(A.STATUS, '결근') "STATUS" FROM ATTENDANCE A RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT WORKING_DAY, WEEK, EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(SYSDATE), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1 "WORKING_DAY" , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'DY') "WEEK" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(SYSDATE)), 'DD') ), ( SELECT E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME , CASE WHEN D.DEPT_NAME != E.DEPT_NAME THEN D.DEPT_NAME || ' ' || E.DEPT_NAME ELSE D.DEPT_NAME END "DEPT_NAME" FROM ( SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , CASE WHEN D1.UPPER_NO = 0 THEN D1.DEPT_NO ELSE D1.UPPER_NO END AS DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D1 ON (D1.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO) ) E LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) ) ) C ON (ATT_DATE = WORKING_DAY AND A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO) WHERE WORKING_DAY < TO_DATE(SYSDATE) AND WEEK IN ('월', '화', '수', '목', '금') AND NVL(TO_DATE(ATT_DATE), TO_DATE(WORKING_DAY)) BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-09-01') AND TO_DATE('2022-09-15') AND NVL(A.STATUS, '결근') IN ('정상', '지각', '결근', '휴가') ORDER BY WORKING_DAY DESC
mapper.insert: insert into attendance ( att_no , emp_no , att_date , start_time ) values ( seq_attno.nextval , #{empNo} , to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI') )
mapper.select: select start_time from attendance where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select end_time from attendance where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: update attendance set end_time = to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI') , total_time = case when to_date(end_time, 'HH:MI') > to_date('04:00', 'HH:MI') then '( to_date(end_time, "HH24:MI") - to_date(start_time, "HH24:MI") ) * 24 * 60 - 60' when to_date(end_time, 'HH:MI') <= to_date('04:00', 'HH:MI') then '( to_date(end_time, "HH24:MI") - to_date(start_time, "HH24:MI") ) * 24 * 60' end , status = case when end_time >= '18:00' then '정상' when start_time >= '09:00' then '지각' end where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.select: select count(*) from vacation where emp_no = #{empNo}

select app_no "app_no" , v.emp_no "emp_no" , to_char(v.enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "enroll_date" , to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "start_date" , to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "end_date" , vac_cause "vac_cause" , appr_status "status" from vacation v join approval on (app_no = appr_no) where v.emp_no = #{empNo} order by app_no desc
select 20 - nvl( sum(vac_days), 0) from vacation v join approval on (app_no = appr_no) where v.emp_no = #{empNo} and appr_status = '완료'
select v.emp_no , 20 - sum(vac_days) "vac_remain" from vacation v join approval on (app_no = appr_no) where appr_status = '완료' group by v.emp_no

select app_no "app_no" , emp_name "emp_name" , to_char(v.enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "enroll_date" , to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "start_date" , to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "end_date" , vac_cause "vac_cause" , appr_status "status" from vacation v join member m on (v.emp_no = m.emp_no) join approval on (app_no = appr_no) where v.emp_no = #{empNo}
